channel.title: Makin Server Or gettin onto servers
channel.description:
hey all i really need help since wen i try 2 get on to servers this message at bottom where scripts r run (i think since im ne it says UID: ##### with numbers and i dont get that and i just open up morpar and go onto the ip that they have alredy which last for 5 mins till connection loss and message come out and if i log in i start from exact spot.
Also i would like if sum1 could help me make a server for myself or sumthing or even better get into another server since i started wen i friend showed me boratscape and it sed like to do all this and it didnt work

item.title: Makin Server Or gettin onto servers
item.dc:creator: @ownage_guy ownage guy
item.description:
@ownage_guy wrote:

[quote=“tim_moughtin, post:2, topic:40327”][quote author=ownage guy link=topic=56494.msg698172#msg698172 date=1167326828]

Also i would like if sum1 could help me make a server for myself or sumthing or even better get into another server since i started wen i friend showed me boratscape and it sed like to do all this and it didnt work
[/quote]

tut sections for connecting to different servers, and also making your own
if you want a server go on 127.0.0.1 and log in to that for your own private use one

as for the mopar error login, try using the webclient if your using the webclient now, use the downloadable one (see downloads section)[/quote]if you want a server go on 127.0.0.1 and log in to that for your own private use one

thats the 1 that just loses itself

Read full topic
item.source: Makin Server Or gettin onto servers

item.title: Makin Server Or gettin onto servers
item.dc:creator: @def_leppard def leppard
item.description:
@def_leppard wrote:

to get on 127.0.0.1 you must click start server this is only for downloadable version

Also i would like if sum1 could help me make a server for myself or sumthing or even better get into another server since i started wen i friend showed me boratscape and it sed like to do all this and it didnt work

tut sections for connecting to different servers, and also making your own

as for the mopar error login, try using the webclient if your using the webclient now, use the downloadable one (see downloads section)
